title: Reinforcement Learning for Robotics with NVIDIA Isaac
description: Reinforcement learning (RL) is a type of machine learning where an agent learns to make decisions in an environment to maximize a reward signal. RL is well-suited for robotics tasks, as it allows robots to learn complex behaviors through trial and error.
